scripts.start: yarn fetch-docs && cd website && yarn fetch-contributors && yarn start
scripts.build: yarn fetch-docs && cd website && yarn fetch-contributors && yarn build
scripts.docusaurus-publish: yarn fetch-docs && cd website && yarn fetch-contributors && yarn docusaurus-publish
scripts.fetch-docs: yarn fetch-graphql-compose && mkdirp ./docs && cp -R ./tmp/graphql-compose/docs/ ./docs/ && yarn gen-api
scripts.fetch-graphql-compose: (git clone https://github.com/graphql-compose/graphql-compose.git ./tmp/graphql-compose) || (cd ./tmp/graphql-compose && git fetch origin master && git reset --hard origin/master && cd ../../)
